body:
12-may-22(thursday):
sun's blazing out today.42°C.sultry kisses in my room add on to this already hot and humid environment.It's my roommate,he is snogging his girlfriend in front of me.i can't tell him off.several reasons,one of them being to not be the party pooper for him.7 months ago i slapped my dad.i see jujube trees rustling on windy sunsets,i am transported back to that place 7months ago.
i hope you are doing fine,i hope you are enjoying it here.
